title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Former United States President Donald Trump has promised to "never allow" the creation of a central bank digital currency in the United States. Meanwhile, VanEck has announced it will soon delist its futures Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF) and ProShares has filed for five Bitcoin ETFs with indirect exposure to BTC.

Former OpenSea product manager appeals conviction

Nathaniel Chastain, a former product manager of NFT marketplace OpenSea, has appealed his conviction on charges related to insider trading.

Read more

title: Solana’s new phone preorders crush Saga’s first-year sales in a day
description: Solana Mobile sees immense demand for Chapter 2 web3 phone with 30K preorders in 30 hours, dwarfing Saga sales in first year

title: Did WIF Insider Buy Before Binance Listing? Here Are the Details
description:
According to Lookonchain, a whale spent $1 million in Solana (SOL) to buy 2.68 million dogwifhat (WIF) 16 hours before Binance announced the WIF perp pair. In another post, the smart money tracking handle noted that the whale could be an insider of the project. Based on the post, Lookonchain noted that the wallet owns […]

The post Did WIF Insider Buy Before Binance Listing? Here Are the Details appeared first on Coin Edition.
